text:
="preserve">Bruce Hurley (February 16, 1934 – November 4, 2020) was an American politician. He was in the Tennessee House of Representatives as a Republican from the 9th District from 1971 to 1989. Hurley was born in Hancock County, Tennessee.
Hurley died on November 4, 2020 in Kingsport, Tennessee at the age of 86.
